description: What is Simple Sticky Notes? It's a simple, easy-to-use, absolutely free, fast and efficient note taking software.
notes: File association(s) were not registered. It may not be possible to install add-ons normally.
It stores its settings at "HKCU\SOFTWARE\Simnet\Simple Sticky Notes".
It also stores add-on content at "%appdata%\Simnet\Simple Sticky Notes".
pre_install: if(!(Test-Path "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Simnet\Simple Sticky Notes")) { New-Item -Path "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Simnet\Simple Sticky Notes" -Force | Out-Null }
if(Test-Path "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Simnet\Simple Sticky Notes") { New-ItemProperty -Path "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Simnet\Simple Sticky Notes" -Name CheckUpdates -Value 0 -PropertyType DWord -Force | Out-Null }

checkver.useragent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/103.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
